snippet: When a family makes Vietnamese summer rolls, there’s something for everyone to do, be it tearing herbs or rolling up vegetables in wrappers.
abstract: Elaine Louie Sprouts column features recipe for Vietnamese summer rolls with black bean garlic dipping sauce that all members of the family can help make.
lead_paragraph: When a family makes Vietnamese summer rolls, there’s something for everyone to do, be it tearing herbs or rolling up vegetables in wrappers.

headline.seo: Making Vietnamese Summer Rolls Is a Job for Hands Large and Small
headline.main: Rolled by Hands Large and Small
headline.print_headline: Rolled by Hands Large and Small
